 Thanks UltraTorrent for the upload it is appreciated....

Usually an English audio comes out 24 hours or so after the Russian audio release... so hopefully tomorrow we have an English audio TS. (BTW, TS & CAM are the same video source... TS usually has a direct-line feed audio, CAM not so much, usually has the audio from the cam's mic - which can have audience sounds added)

@Mondo, I agree with  your sentiment. Being ungrateful for something that is free is just stupid. But it's not like someone is screaming "OMFG SEED PLZ NAO" or "THIS MOVIE SUX, WHY WOULD YOU U/L IT NOOB!!!11one!!" They're complaint is  that it should have been noted that this is not in English.

I've run into this before though, and it's just a guess based on speculation, but I'd guess that someone grabbed a copy of one of the already available Russian versions, changed the title (leaving out the word Russian), and put it up for others as if it were their own. Pretty common practice, even among trusted uploaders. Look closely sometime, they often have a really close file size, the difference being added samples or images. Sometimes they are uploaded within minutes of each other, as if the uploaders are in a popularity contest. Exact same content, but who gets more seeds, who gets more leaches, etc. Often, the dumb ones don't even bother to change the title. So at least UT did that, if this is the case, as I suspect. 
Ever had a trusted uploader that you have used before (Raymond comes to mind) that for no reason out of the blue uploads something that is just utter garbage? The same garbage you got a few days earlier from someone you don't normally download from, or someone that consistently produces shite? That's what I'm talking about. Many trusted earn their rep just by cloning other people's work.

You want to make sure you are getting quality every time? Find someone like what aXXo used to do, or FXG does now, when they're active. Sure, you waited a little longer to see it, but the quality is unmatched. Otherwise, it's often hit and miss. 

I thank the uploaders for their time and contributions, but when they clone someone else's work, or in this case at the very least forget to mention that it's in a different language... That's pretty weak. So while NASH's comments are out of line based on profanity, NASH has every right to complain. If it was noted that this was in Russian, I'm betting a lot of people would have skipped this. 
Cheers.
